General.Name: Plum Acquisition Corp. I
General.Description: Plum Acquisition Corp. I focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 2021 Fillmore Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94115
